data.title: John D. Houston II
data.meta_description: John Houston II counsels individuals in estate planning, estate administration and probate.
data.text:
ATTENTION CLIENTS: Be advised that, effective January 1, 2024, the Corporate Transparency Act went into effect, which requires certain business organizations to report information about their beneficial owners. Failure to report by the mandated deadlines may result in civil and criminal penalties. To learn more, click here.

John D. Houston II

Of Counsel

Healthcare

jdh@hh-law.com

412.288.1843

Practice Areas

Health Care Law • Business Law • Estates and Trusts

Overview

John is a founding member of Houston Harbaugh. His practice is focused on healthcare, general corporate matters, and estate planning and wealth preservation.

Experience

AV Preeminent Rated Martindale-Hubbell Peer Review Rating System

John P. “Jerry” Auld Award for Community Service Passavant Hospital Foundation- Legacy of Caring Awards 2016

Best Lawyers in America 2009-2018

Best Lawyers in America – Lawyer of the Year in Health Care Law, 2019

Member Allegheny County Bar Association

Education & Credentials

Education

George Washington University, LLB

Haverford College, B.A.

Bar Admissions

Commonwealth of Pennsylvania

U.S. Tax Court

Thought Leadership

Fellow, American College of Probate Counsel

Past Trustee, Pennsylvania Bar Insurance Trust

Former Member, Pittsburgh Child Guidance Foundation Board of Trustees (past President)

Former Board Member; Secretary; Past Chairman of the Board, Pittsburgh Lifetime Care Community

Former Member, Pittsburgh Public Theater Board of Trustees (past Treasurer)

Former Board Member, UPMC Passavant Hospital

Fellow, Allegheny County Bar Foundation

Fellow, Pennsylvania Bar Foundation

Member and Secretary, Passavant Foundation Board

Board Member, Sherwood Oaks Fund
